Senior Generative Artificial Intelligence Engineer

Pittsburgh, PA, United States

Full Time Senior-level / Expert USD 109K - 203K *
  • Website
  • LinkedIn
  • Search

Covestro

Discover Covestro: Leading in high-tech polymers and sustainability for key industries.

View all jobs at Covestro

Apply now Apply later

Posted 2 weeks ago

We are Covestro. We are curious. We are courageous. We are colorful. We refine chemical material solutions with game-changing products. Let us empower you to push boundaries. Join us and our 18,000 colleagues now and together we will make the world a brighter place. Â 

The Senior Generative Artificial Intelligence (GenAI) Engineer develops innovative Generative AI solutions based on technologies, tools, algorithms, and methods from the Generative AI field. The Senior GenAI Engineer works on solutions from ideation through prototyping, production deployment and operations.

Major Tasks and Responsibilities

  • Lead the implementation of generative AI use cases that bring measurable economic benefit to Covestro by designing and implementing suitable generative AI solution architectures, including software design and Cloud architectures.
  • Oversee use cases throughout the entire lifecycle of generative AI products, such as development and implementation of prototypes, minimum viable products (MVP) as well as in supporting the products in the operational phase.
  • Select, evaluate, and make decisions on proposals from external solution providers and consulting companies in terms of their effectiveness and usefulness.
  • Establish and contribute to internal communities of practice to shape the generative AI tech-stack of Covestro.

Basic Qualifications

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Data Science, or a related field with 7+ yearsâ€™ experience; OR Masterâ€™s degree with 5+ yearsâ€™ experience; OR PhD with 3+ yearsâ€™ experience
  • 7 years of experience in a software engineering role
  • Experience in Cloud technologies (preferably AWS)

Preferred Qualifications

  • Master's degree in Computer Science, Data Science, or a related field with with 5+ yearsâ€™ experience; OR PhD with 3+ yearsâ€™ experience

Knowledge and Skills

  • Solid experience with generative AI frameworks, runtimes, and foundational models like RAG, Amazon Bedrock, Azure OpenAI, Vector Databases, and LangChain
  • Experience in a programming language like Python or TypeScript
  • Knowledge about AWS Serverless technologies like Lambda, DynamoDB, SNS, and SQS
  • Knowledge about Infrastructure as Code (CDK, CloudFormation, etc.)Ability to present and effectively communicate to colleagues from different departments and levels.
  • Ability to work in a dynamic and fast-paced working environment
  • Project and product management experience

#LI-Hybrid

YOUR APPLICATION

Are you as curious, courageous and colorful as we are? If so, we can offer you an exciting career opportunity. We look forward to receiving your application and resume. Become part of our team - apply now!

Equal Employment Opportunity: Hiring and advancement are based on job-related requirements and on an individual's qualifications to perform a job. All aspects of employment are carried out free of discrimination or harassment based on race, color, religion, sex (including pregnancy), national origin, age, disabilities, genetic information, veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity/gender expression or any unlawful criterion, existing under applicable federal, state, or local law.
